department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 10 November 2023 at 2:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

full_summary:
=====================================

### Notice of Invitation to Tender

**Title (English/French)**

*   W7006-22P004 Publication Services / W7006-22P004 Services de publication

**Reference Number**

*   WS3969120708-Doc3971641796

**Invitation to Tender Status**

*   **Closed**

**Solicitation Details**

*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2024
*   **Tendering Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** The solicitation is subject to various international trade agreements, including the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), among others. See the Invitation to Tender document for a detailed list of applicable trade agreements.

**Requirements Summary**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking technical publication services for ongoing maintenance support of CT-142 Dash-8 aircraft. The resulting contract will cover a period of one year from the date of award, with the option to extend by an additional three (3) one-year periods.

To be eligible to bid, companies must utilize the Electronic Procurement Solution (SAP Ariba) to transmit their bid electronically, with the exception of the hardcopy bid components. Bidders must refer to the Request for Proposal document for further information on security requirements, Controlled Goods Program requirements, and intellectual property requirements.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarification regarding this Invitation to Tender, please contact Diane Warnell at [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Additional Documents

For detailed information and to access the complete Invitation to Tender document, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17613084?extsite=MTc2MTMwODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17613084?extsite=MTc2MTMwODRfQU4wMTQ4
